lines.text: "You can tell it's Mattel. It's swell!"

[singing]
It's time for Funday Funnies. / And Matty is your host. / With Baby Huey and Little Audrey / And Casper the Friendly Ghost. / It's time for Funday Funnies / With all the friends you know. / There's Herman and Katnip / And Buzzy... #

[singing]
Monday. Tuesday. Wednesday. Thursday. Friday. Saturday. Funday!

[singing]
# Matty's Funday Funnies / Are coming on the air. / So grab a chair / And stay right there. / It's Funday everywhere! #

And now until next Sunday / We'll miss you all the most. / With Baby Huey and Little Audrey / And Casper the Friendly Ghost. / It's seven days to Funday / And seven days make a "wink." / You'll be amazed / To start your days. / It's sooner than you think. #

[singing]
Monday. Tuesday. Wednesday. Thursday. Friday. Saturday. Funday!
Matty's Funday Funnies / Will be back in a wink. / You'll be amazed to count the days. / It's sooner than you think! #
you can tell it's Mattel. It's swell!
